item.description:
Drumming Circle Intensive
with Keshav Howe

This intensive workshop is open to people who want to explore a traditional shamanic method of connecting with the spirit of unity. All levels of musical expertise can come together this evening in a community drum circle, as we share our rhythmical spirit.

You can bring whatever drums, percussion instruments or rattles of your choice to the intensive. You do not need to have any drumming experience - you do not even have to have to have to bring an instrument - there will be plenty to share. The quality of the music produced is based the relationship with the sacredness of the circle. Our natural and divine rhythm reveals itself this evening - the result is magic.

Join us as one powerful voice out of the many - via the power of rhythm and joy.

GLASTONBURY- Sacred Rivers Yoga
Time: 7 to 9 p.m.
Cost: $20 cash
item.name: Shamanic Drumming
